title: Mushroom and vegetable soup
ingredients: ['30g (1/2 oz) butter', '2 carrots, peeled and sliced', '1 medium onion, sliced', '1/2 leek, sliced', '1 stalk celery, sliced', '1 sprig thyme, leaves removed', '1kg (2 lb) mushrooms, sliced', '1.4L (2 3/8 pints) chicken stock', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '3 spring onions, chopped']
